dict.acceptation: 建设者，建筑者；创建者；经营建筑业者；增洁剂，促净剂；

sent.orig: Two ways of admixture programming with C++ Builder and Matlab are advanced.
sent.trans: 开发了利用Matlab Engine实现C++ Builder对Matlab功能调用和利用Matcom实现C++ Builder与Matlab语言的混合编程两种计算技术，提高了计算效率和工程应用价值。

sent.orig: LAN in a computer search of program source code in C BUILDER development.
sent.trans: 一个在局域网中搜索计算机的程序原代码用C++BUILDER开发。

sent.orig: The main development tool is Borland C++ Builder and the thinking of program is Modularization etc.
sent.trans: 软件的编译器主要是BorlandC++Builder,采用了模块化等编程思想。

sent.orig: Based on Dreamweaver and C~(++ ) Builder,an applied multimedia courseware for tower equipment design is developed.
sent.trans: 以Dreamweaver,C++Builder为工具，开发出化工原理板式塔课程设计多媒体CAI应用软件。

sent.orig: The data processing program for upper computer is compiled with C++ Builder language.
sent.trans: 上位机的数据处理程序应用C++ Builder语言编写。
